node.title: How to Give a Bible Study
node.description: Do you have a desire to reach people who don’t know Jesus? Do you feel unsure about how to do it? This seminar will inspire you through testimonies and give you the tools you need to understand how you can study the Bible with others and lead them to Jesus. Learn practical tips on how you can naturally turn a conversation to spiritual matters and how to avoid common pitfalls made when studying the Bible with people.
